channel.title: Connecting to Update Server Error. Please Help
channel.description:
The Hyperion Client isn't connecting! It is stuck at Connecting to update server. I suppose that is due to the client not being able to find the cache. So i went into signlink, and changed the directory of the cache to C:\ and then i put the cache there, still it's at "Connecting to Update Server..." It's not moving.
Help?

item.title: Connecting to Update Server Error. Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Server response 73?
I think there’s another anti-leech ; there’s only about 20 of those response types going from 0 - 20.

Read full topic

Yup, just made sure.

Just downloaded a new Hyperion client. It loaded, but then it said unexpected responce from server. and it gives me like responce 73 in the client cmd

item.title: Connecting to Update Server Error. Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Level_120_Dungeoneer Level 120 Dungeoneering
item.description:
@Level_120_Dungeoneer wrote:

*1337

I already fixed the PJA antileech.

the Hyperion Client isn't connecting! It is stuck at Connecting to update server. I suppose that is due to the client not being able to find the cache. So i went into signlink, and changed the directory of the cache to C:\ and then i put the cache there, still it's at "Connecting to Update Server..." It's not moving.

Help?

Now i’ve got a new problem

item.source: Connecting to Update Server Error. Please Help

item.title: Connecting to Update Server Error. Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

first off, hyperion has an anti leech. you have to take out “EPICSHIT1227”

If you cant get it to run, don’t use it, and move on to pi or delta.

Read full topic
item.source: Connecting to Update Server Error. Please Help

item.title: Connecting to Update Server Error. Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Level_120_Dungeoneer Level 120 Dungeoneering
item.description:
@Level_120_Dungeoneer wrote:

I wasn’t thinking I guess. I solved the issue. Thanks.

Now the Hyperion Client isn’t connecting! It is stuck at Connecting to update server. I suppose that is due to the client not being able to find the cache. So i went into signlink, and changed the directory of the cache to C:\ and then i put the cache there, still it’s at “Connecting to Update Server…” It’s not moving.

Help?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

axecutor9090:

FileNotFoundException

Take a second to read that and add some spaces.

The file wasn’t found. What file was it?
